Item ID3477

Rune plateskirt (t) is a part of rune trimmed armour and a reward from hard Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as the regular Rune plateskirt, and requires level 40 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+51+49+47-4+49
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (hard)N/A 11/1,625

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The plateskirt's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -7 to -11.

[[File:Rune plateskirt (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Rune plateskirt (t)''' is a part of [[rune trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It has the same stats as the regular [[Rune plateskirt]], and requires level 40 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
